name: Saucy Suitors (Demo)
description:
• Full game planned with romance routes and multiple endings!

This demo was made by me, Odd Lazdo, in one month for NaNoRenO 2018. It's my first attempt at making any kind of visual novel and I know nothing about coding, so my apologies for how basic it is. I wasn't able to finish the GUI in time for NaNo, so that will be my first update in the coming months. But I had a lot of fun making this and I hope you enjoy the demo! Please let me know what you think!
